feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: Join me in my Journey
entry.content:
Hello.

I have a thirst of knowledge. I plan to document my journey on this quest.

Iâ€™m going to be learning languages, maths, creative writing and general software development among a myriad of things.

My plan for the year is as follows:

  • Sanderson 2023 Reading Challenge,
  • Dive into Data Science,
  • Spanish till A2,
  • Marvel Reading Challenge,
  • and much more.

The reader can checkout the entire backlog here

Finally, my blog will have random ramblings. I hope the reader feels as if they are listening to a friend.
entry.summary: A short introduction to the blog
